official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on N,N-dimethyl-N'- (3-((methylamino) carboyl)oxy)phenyl) methani midamide monohydrochloride.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on n,n-dimethyl-n'(3-((methylamino)-carbonyl)oxy)-phenyl)-methanimidamide monohydrochloride.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on N,N-dimethyl-N'- (3-((methylamino) carboyl)oxy)phenyl) methani midamide monohydrochloride.
